channel.title: Someone Has Butchered The Mods Wikipedia Article
channel.description: Someone keeps screwing up the mod's Wikipedia Article. I remember before the crash there was a thread about this and now it's happened again. Does anyone have a clue as to who this person is?

item.title: Someone Has Butchered The Mods Wikipedia Article
item.dc:creator: Neon_Impulse
item.description:
DON’T TOUCH IT! I’M ALREADY DYING FROM LAUGHTER!

Read full topic

item.title: Someone Has Butchered The Mods Wikipedia Article
item.dc:creator: raw_bean
item.description:
Ramirezoid:

What did he do besides make dorkposts?

He started fights and arguments. They weren’t always his fault, but he seemed fundamentally incapable of letting something go or taking the high road, or taking a ribbing in good humour. Even Kaze and ODB can occasionally laugh at themselves or drop the superiority and let something ride (occasionally). Every other post he made pissed someone off mightily, and whether it was deliberate or accidental he never did anything but fan the resultant flames. He was banned for the sake of a some peace around here.

Read full topic
item.source: Someone Has Butchered The Mods Wikipedia Article

He didn’t know how to shut the fuck up.

But that’s something he did not do, not something he did!

:3

item.description:
IP usually gives it away easily… could be the same e-mail, or similar e-mail address. And these people are easy to spot anyway, especially when they do the same grammar mistakes, or put up the same images (ORLY?)…
I’ve had my share of continuously-bypassing-ban people on another forum I admin on
